mapper.select: select DISTINCT m.menu_id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.url,m.perms,m.type,m.icon,m.order_num from sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = rm.role_id JOIN sys_user_role ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username =#{username} and m.parent_id = 0

select DISTINCT m.perms from sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = rm.role_id JOIN sys_user_role ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username =#{username}
